info.title: Tracking Software
info.description:
## Welcome

This is a place to put general notes and extra information, for internal use.

To get started designing/documenting this API, select a version on the left. # Title
No Description

post.description: Following a good response save 'user_api_hash' and use it for others requests. It may change in the future if user change a password, when system will return error.

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: Other user's to login as, email

get.description:
http://[YOUR_URL]/insert.php

uniqueId - device IMEI
protocol - device protocol
altitude - current device altitude in meters
course - current device angle from 0 to 360
latitude - current device latitude
longitude - current device longitude
speed - current device speed in knot unit (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knot_(unit))
fixTime - current device time in timestamp with miliseconds
attributes - key:value your other parameters

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Position attributes. Cannot be specified in GET request body.

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: Current device speed in knot unit (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knot_(unit))

parameters.name: fixTime
parameters.description: Current device time in timestamp with miliseconds

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies amount of items per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page should be retrieved

parameters.name: online
parameters.description: Find items which status is `online` for the last specified amount of mintues

parameters.name: offline
parameters.description: Find items which status is `offline` for the last specified amount of mintues

get.description: Return only devices whose information has changed, all the response returns "time", the time needed to transmit the next request.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Filter items that were updated since provided UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: filter[online]
parameters.description: Find items which status is `online` for the last specified amount of mintues

parameters.name: filter[offline]
parameters.description: Find items which status is `offline` for the last specified amount of mintues

How many seconds after appearing popup fades away (0 for never)

geofences.description: Geofence IDs. For `type`: geofence_in, geofence_out, geofence_inout

parameters.description: If type = 1, then user events are taken, otherwise - general

account_created.description: Determines if send email notification that account is created

email_verification.description: Determines if email verification is required

password_generate.description: Determines if password is generated or typed in manually

password_confirmation.description: Value must be the same as 'password'

group_id.description: 1 - Admin, 2 - User, 3 - Manager, 4 - Demo, 5 - Operator, 6 - Supervisor

get.summary: Get geofence name or address from coordinate
